Ronald Maurice Darling Jr. (born August 19, 1960) is an American former right-handed starting pitcher in Major League Baseball (MLB). He played for the New York Mets, Montreal Expos and Oakland Athletics. Darling currently works as a color commentator for national baseball coverage on TBS. He was born in Honolulu, Hawaii.
On May 6, 2019, Darling announced that he had been diagnosed with thyroid cancer.
